params._subDAOAddress: Address of subDAO to declare as child of parentDAO.

declareSubDAO(address).notice: Declares certain address as subDAO of parentDAO.

updateDAOName(string).notice: Updates the DAO's registered name. It's not unique so shouldn't be used for differentiating DAOs anyhow

userdoc.notice: An utility contract for settling DAO's name and declaring parent->child relationships.Might be extended in future to handle more Fractal-specific utility stuffThe name of the DAO and child->parent relationships are not stored and not verified anyhow.So those events should be used only for visual representation and not actual business logic.
